snippet: Mr. Vogt interpreted these composers and Cristian Macelaru conducted in a concert on Friday at Avery Fisher Hall.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by German pianist Lars Vogt as part of Mostly Mozart Festival at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Vogt interpreted these composers and Cristian Macelaru conducted in a concert on Friday at Avery Fisher Hall.

headline.main: Review: Lars Vogt Presents Late-Career Beethoven and Schubert at Mostly Mozart
headline.print_headline: A Pianist Balances Power and Delicacy
